Brands.Name: 2EROS
Brands.description: 2EROS was conceptualised by Australian designer Jason Hoeung in 2008 and is now one of Australia’s rising men’s underwear, beachwear and active wear brands that empower men to live actively with style. Our strong connection to the Australian lifestyle, delivers pieces that are stylish, timeless and functional, while avoiding and rejecting mediocrity to promote self-expression and confidence.

Brands.Name: 2UNDR
Brands.description: The vision of 2UNDR™ was simple. Inspired by the kangaroo pouch, we set out to create a high-performance men’s athletic underwear, with the versatility of everyday use. Using the most advanced construction techniques and materials, our patented Joey Pouch® separates man’s most valuable assets away from the body to reduce unwanted skin-on-skin contact. With more support than a standard brief and improved airflow to keep you cool, 2UNDR products provide the best fit, comfort and style a man could ever need. Designed in Vancouver, worn everywhere.

Brands.Name: 2wink
Brands.description: 2wink Australia was founded by friends Eddie Jones and Mark Turner in 2005, after being disappointed with other brands of underwear that were expensive and didn't hold up well. The name 2wink was created from the concept of 'winking' one's eye. In 2010, Carl McNeill officially bought out Eddie Jones's interest in the company.

Brands.Name: 2(X)IST
Brands.description: Founded in 1991, 2(X)IST has become one of America's leading brands for men's designer underwear. Pronounced 'two exist,' the brand took what was once a purely functional male garment and elevated it to new levels of fashion by applying 3 key tenets of great design: cut, materials, and fit. 2(X)IST creates better-fitting underwear for fashion-forward, confident, and modern men.

Brands.Name: 32 Degrees
Brands.description: At 32 Degrees, we believe in value and comfort by offering everyday basic items to fit everyone’s wardrobe and wallet.

Brands.Name: Abercrombie & Fitch
Brands.description: Designed for extreme comfort, without sacrificing personal style, Abercrombie & Fitch mens underwear is the perfect go-to base layer. Super soft, so stretchy, and totally breathable for unmatched comfort, our mens underwear is available in the form of boxers, briefs, and boxer briefs—all with a perfect fit and feel. Our classic woven boxers are designed to give you a little breathing room, while our briefs are designed with a closer fit, 4-way stretch, moisture-wicking fabric and elasticized waistband. And our boxer brief meets in the middle for optimum comfort and style.

Brands.Name: Activemen
Brands.description: ActiveMan has been making jockstraps since the late 1800s under the Flarico name. Today they have rebranded and revamped their jockstraps, producing new colors and styles while maintaining the same high quality that ActiveMan has been known for over the years.

Brands.Name: Adam
Brands.description: Boxer shorts and boxer briefs produced with 100% GOTS certified organic cotton by Adam. Strong yet comfortable waistband, designs with character. Shop Adam for men and women. Free Delivery Available. Mon-Fri Call Support. Multiple Payment Options.

Brands.Name: Adidas
Brands.description: Adidas has its roots in Germany but we are a truly global company. Around the world we employ over 62,000 people. At our global HQ in Herzogenaurach, Germany, our teams are made up of people from over 100 different nations. These numbers alone can easily suggest that adidas is quite a large and also multifaceted organization. True. But we keep things simple, lean and fast. And we will use this approach now to give an overview of what our company is all about.

Brands.Name: AD Addicted
Brands.description: Addicted was founded in 2009 in Barcelona, dedicating itself to the design, manufacturing and sale of men’s swimwear.In a fairly short amount of time, the brand experienced rapid growth, aided by the success of the premier brand: ES Collection.

Brands.Name: Agacio
Brands.description: Agacio proudly offers sexy designer men's underwear. Each pair manufactured with only the highest-quality pure breathable material which allows for an incredibly comfortable all day wear.

Brands.Name: Alan Red
Brands.description: https://www.alanredunderwear.com/16-boxer

Brands.Name: Alexander Cobb
Brands.description: ALANRED UNDERWEAR is fully styled and designed in the establishments of a company that operates since 1940 in Italy in the field of quality knitwear. We have the total knowledge of t-shirts outwear and underwear, tops and bottoms.

Brands.Name: Alfani
Brands.description: French underwear maker HOM has paired up with fellow countryman Alexis Mabille, an up-and-coming fashion designer, to release a line of prêt-à-porter sous-vêtements – that’s ready-to-wear underwear – for the mass market.

Brands.Name: Allbirds
Brands.description: A native of New Zealand, Tim Brown was always well versed in the magical qualities of merino wool. Inherently curious, he began asking himself why such a remarkable, sustainable resource was virtually absent in the footwear industry. And with that spirit of wonder, the Allbirds journey began.

Brands.Name: Alpha Male Undies
Brands.description: https://alphamaleundies.com/collections/boxers-trunks

Brands.Name: AMAT
Brands.description: Underwear by Amat Nimitpark Since 2009.

Brands.Name: American Apparel
Brands.description: For the past fifteen years, American Apparel brought quality basics to consumers. Our story starts in North Carolina as a small wholesale business who had a commitment to deliver the best American-made t-shirt at an affordable price. The minimalism and simplicity of our design as well as the large and original range of colors have set American Apparel as a leader not only in the wholesale business, but also in the entire garment industry.

Brands.Name: American Eagle Outfitters
Brands.description: American Eagle Outfitters® (NYSE: AEO) is a leading global specialty retailer offering high-quality, on-trend clothing, accessories and personal care products at affordable prices under its American Eagle® and Aerie® brands. We are an inclusive, optimistic and empowering company that celebrates the individuality of our customers and associates. Our purpose is to show the world that there’s REAL power in the optimism of youth.

Brands.Name: Andra Group
Brands.description: CEO Tomima Edmark founded HerRoom.com in 1998 to give women a way to effortlessly purchase lingerie online. Shortly after, HisRoom.com was created to offer men the same convenience and simplicity in shopping for undergarments online.

Brands.Name: Andrew Christian
Brands.description: Since 1997, Andrew Christian is not only an iconic company, but it's also backed by a real designer! With his innovative technologies, fit, and original designs, he has earned a spot in Inc Magazine as one of the fastest growing companies in America for multiple consecutive years.

Brands.Name: Antony Morato
Brands.description: The Antony Morato project focuses on a fundamental change that has affected the Fashion market over the past years: the need to fit a 'new man'.

Brands.Name: Aonga
Brands.description: Aonga™, brand of damn fine men's underwear. Premium fit, on trend designed mens boxer briefs. The Most Comfortable Everyday Men's Underwear!

Brands.Name: Arc'teryx
Brands.description: Our beliefs reflect the principles we have learned from experience, shaping us both as individuals and collectively. Living up to our values is a matter of conviction and ethics. In doing so, we become more inspired and empowered to build a stronger, more enduring business.

Brands.Name: ARKET
Brands.description: ARKET is a modern-day market that offers quality clothing, shoes and accessories, and a selection of homeware and stationery items. Our stores also include a vegetarian café.

Brands.Name: A.P.C.
Brands.description: Created by Jean Touitou in 1987, A.P.C. is a French clothing brand, authentic and accessible by way of its style, prices and philosophy. While A.P.C. first gained renown for its classic jeans in raw denim, the brand now offers a complete collection of men's and women's clothing and accessories that embodies a simple, casual elegance. Jean Touitou works with his wife, Judith Touitou, artistic director of A.P.C.

Brands.Name: Blackspade
Brands.description: A full-fledged lifestyle brand that is dedicated to covering you in the most natural comfort possible. Blackspade is a brand based near the Aegean Sea - one of the oldest corners of civilization in the world - and while the area is ancient the style of Blackspade is totally today and the comfort you feel when wearing it is timeless. Perfect fit and softness are what Blackspade strive for in their men's underwear. Whatever your favorite pair of underwear is- a brief, a trunk, a boxer brief- when you try Blackspade you'll notice enough of a difference to see the benefits of wearing Blackspade underwear.

Brands.Name: Bombas
Brands.description: If there’s a brand that’s impressed the heck out of us as far as the best men’s underwear is concerned, it’d be Bombas. Men’s underwear is a recent addition to the brand’s line of stellar and well-reviewed basics, and let us just say this: If you love Bombas socks or Bombas T-shirts, you’re going to love the brand’s well-fitting, perfectly soft underwear. It’s underwear for the modern man, from a basics brand that’ll outfit you from head to toe.

Brands.Name: Bonds
Brands.description: A lot can happen in 100 years. We know because this year, Bonds turns 100 years young. From our early beginnings in 1915, as a small manufacturer of women’s hosiery to now as one of Australia’s most iconic brands, we’ve shaped ourselves to fit the needs (and bodies) of Aussie families.

Brands.Name: Bonobos
Brands.description: We started Bonobos because we couldn't find pants that fit. They were either way too tight or too boxy. We fixed it. Now we've expanded our playbook to shirts and suits.

Brands.Name: Boss Hugo Boss
Brands.description: HUGO BOSS is one of the leading companies in the premium segment of the global apparel market. Around 14,600 employees worldwide work to always offer our customers the best. From collections to service. The BOSS and HUGO Men's and Womenswear not only cover businesswear, casual outfits and athleisurewear, but also elegant eveningwear for special occasions. Our claim: no matter what the day brings, our customers should be perfectly dressed in every situation and for every occasion. Shoes and accessories as well as licensed products such as fragrances, eyewear and watches round off the range. In fiscal year 2019 HUGO BOSS generated sales of EUR 2.9 billion.

Brands.Name: Bread & Boxers
Brands.description: Perhaps you’re familiar with the Bread & Boxers line as sold by the fine folks at Bespoke Post (and through the brand’s own site), but if not, get acquainted as soon as possible. Bread & Boxers makes the process of buying some of the best men’s underwear quite simple and understated, actually — just like its stylish basics. Billed as “everyday favorites” by the brand and available at reasonable prices

Brands.Name: Brooks
Brands.description: In 1818, Henry Sands Brooks founded Brooks Brothers, the first ready-to-wear fashion emporium in America. Since then, we are proud to have become an institution that has shaped the American style of dress through fashion innovation, fine quality, personal service, and exceptional value in our products.

Brands.Name: Bugatchi
Brands.description: Discover our vast selection of underwear, nightwear, boxers, briefs, pajamas, bathrobes, and socks for men from Bugatchi.

Brands.Name: CALIDA
Brands.description: From Switzerland into the wider world – that’s CALIDA’s motto. For over 75 years, the company has been transporting its values of sustainability, premium Swiss quality and contemporary design around the world. CALIDA is one of Europe’s leading underwear brands, representing innovative materials, outstanding craftsmanship and a passion for detail.

Brands.Name: Calvin Klein
Brands.description: Calvin Klein is a global lifestyle brand that exemplifies bold, progressive ideals and a seductive aesthetic. We seek to thrill and inspire our audience while using provocative imagery and striking designs to ignite the senses.

Brands.Name: CDLP
Brands.description: In 2016, Christian Larson and Andreas Palm set out to revolutionize men’s underwear, creating a new generation of products built with intention and purpose. Today, CDLP is a design house of focused, luxury essentials within the categories of underwear, tops, swim, performance, and home. Developed with innovation in Sweden, the line is consciously constructed in Europe using future-orientated materials.

Brands.Name: CELINE
Brands.description: Few brand names are quite as cool to have haloing around your waistband than Celine's. Keeping things simple and sophisticated, these French-made white boxer briefs have just the right amount of stretch to them to keep things comfortable and supportive, giving you an extra hit of designer confidence as the base of only the suavest 'fits.

Brands.Name: Cell Block
Brands.description: Cell Block Legendz was officially born on March 26, 2018 in Upstate New York. Inspired by our first-hand experiences of supporting family, friends and loved ones who are and have been incarcerated or affected by incarceration, we realize and relate to the day-to-day challenges presented to those affected by incarceration.

Brands.Name: Champion
Brands.description: Get men's underwear with great performance and unbeatable comfort. From workout to workday you'll find briefs and boxer briefs with performance features including moisture management, cool mesh and no ride-up legbands. Champion underwear makes your first layer your most comfortable.

Brands.Name: Chaps
Brands.description: What was launched in 1978 as traditional men’s clothing with individual flair has grown into a lifestyle brand for the entire family. Today, the complete collection spans sportswear, uniforms, suiting, and special occasion dressing. In character and choice, it is the embodiment of all-American style: authentic, natural, and timeless.

Brands.Name: Clever
Brands.description: Clever men’s underwear hails from Colombia, combining sexy, South American style with lots of color and texture, for a massive collection of men’s Bikinis, Boxer Briefs, Briefs, Jockstraps, Tank Tops, Thongs, Trunks. Most Clever men’s underwear styles has a sporty edge to it that’s both aesthetically pleasing as well as functional, featuring high-quality design and unique fabrics. For the Clever men’s underwear collection, fabrics come in high-stretch microfiber as well as stretch cotton, and the designs vary between brightly colored prints to sheer and semi-sheer versions. Clever men’s swimwear offers a large selection of men’s swimsuits, including Swim Briefs and Swim Trunks. No matter what the occasion, from everyday underwear to a sexy men’s underwear style that’s perfect for a special occasion, there is a Clever underwear or Clever swimwear style that is ideal.

Brands.Name: Cocksox
Brands.description: Everyone needs a support crew, and for the men of the world, Cocksox is it. Cocksox is men’s underwear and swimwear designed specifically for the male anatomy. Support, comfort and enhancement are the fundamentals of every garment we make. Cocksox is all about supporting manhood by supporting YOUR manhood.

Brands.Name: COCOA by NS
Brands.description: For men with a darker skin tone, Nubian Skin offers a breathable and super-soft boxer briefs that come in variety of rich brown colors to provide a birthday suit illusion. They're the perfect balance of sexy and comfortable.

Brands.Name: COS
Brands.description: Every piece is made to last beyond the season. With a focus on craftmanship, we bring you essentials for the modern wardrobe. Buy better, keep forever.

Brands.Name: Cottonique
Brands.description: Unlike other stories, our humble beginnings started quite differently with an open-ended question: 'What should people with allergies wear?'

Brands.Name: Cover Male
Brands.description: Sophistication and class have never looked sexier. This unique male intimate line is like nothing that you have ever seen before. Bringing its inspiration from the men who want to indulge their passion for underwear. Cover Male excels in showcasing a great mixture of class, elegance, and masculinity in each of its collections

Brands.Name: CR7
Brands.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's successful career is the result of dedication, extreme talent and a commitment to high caliber play. CR7-US products are modeled after these essentials. We use quality materials for structure, breathability and versatility. Whether on the field, or watching a game from your couch, our designs perform the job they were built for - with style and comfort.

Brands.Name: Culprit
Brands.description: It's the first thing you put on in the morning and the last thing you take off before making love. It's the soul of your outfit, your comfort around the house attire, it's what people see when you take your pants off, so we make it count.

Brands.Name: C-IN2
Brands.description: We continue to innovate with new textile designs to give our customers the softest fabric so you can stay comfortable in your underwear all day, whether you're in your office, at home, at the gym or out on the town.
